name: Bike GP Rider: The Moto Race
name_original: Bike GP Rider: The Moto Race
description:
Welcome to this Special Grand Prix! All the best riders are here for one reason: The Glory. Compete with your best-loved motorbike and make sure you get to the number one position faster than the others to make it into the Hall of Fame.
It won't be easy but the prize is worth it! Avoid hitting the other riders, especially if you want to finish the race and not being badly hurt, and keep passing all the bikes you come across.
Look, the lights are about to start! Ready, set, go!

GAME HIGHLIGHTS:
- 7 Unlockable Motorbikes
- Daily Rewards
- Custom Difficulty
- Custom Weather
- Unlockable Game Modes
